title: FT: SGC 30 Cobb bat off, SGC 20 Cobb bat on - BOTH SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: SGC 30 Cobb bat off, SGC 20 Cobb bat on - BOTH SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have this pair of Cobbs available for trade. Would really like to put towards a low grade yellow caramel Cobb or a Young with glove EPDG if anyone has one. Otherwise bigger HOFer EPDGs would be great.

Otherwise asking $SOLD for the bat off and $SOLD for the bat on. Both pretty well below VCP…..

Available via PM.

Thanks for looking!

Jeff
